title: Are all computers physically connected to each other? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, not in any ordinary use of the term “physically connected”. If I talk to someone, then vibrations are physically moving from my mouth to their ears, and from their mouth to my ears… but no one would normally say that two people are “physically connected” just because they’re talking to each other. In the same way, a computer on a wireless network is not “physically connected” to other computers on that network in any normal sense of the phrase.

No. Not all computers are wired to the internet. Some are not even wirelessly connected. The computer I use for DJ work is not connected to the internet at all. The computers that run most cars are not connected to the outside.
